Parameter.Name: Comp_Cond
Parameter.Comment: If post-benefit per capita household income is still below the extreme poverty line...

Parameter.Name: Comp_perTU
Parameter.Comment: ... complement benefit value to achieve this cut-off

Parameter.Name: Output_Add_Var
Parameter.Comment: *ajustar para 2020 e 2021 de acordo com o AE, conferir

Parameter.Name: Comp_Cond
Parameter.Comment: For each poor or extremely poor child aged 0-15, with children aged 6-15 in school...
Parameter.Value: IsDepChild & dag<=15 & ((dag < 6) | ( dag >= 6 & dec > 0)) & IsNtoMchild#2 & y_pbf#1/nPersInUnit#1<= $povline

Parameter.Name: Comp_Cond
Parameter.Comment: If per capita household income is below the extreme poverty line, ...

Parameter.Name: Comp_Cond
Parameter.Comment: For each poor or extremely poor child aged 16-18 in school...
Parameter.Value: IsDepChild & dag>15 & dag<18 & dec > 0 & IsNtoMchild#3 & y_pbf#1/nPersInUnit#1 <= $povline

Function.Name: DefConst
Function.Comment: Standard benefit values and poverty definitons valid from July 2018 to October 2021.

Parameter.Comment: Extreme poverty line cut-off defined by Brazilian law (in monthly per capita household income).

Parameter.Name: $povline
Parameter.Comment: Poverty line cut-off defined by Brazilian law (in monthly per capita household income).

Function.Name: ArithOp
Function.Comment: Adjusting for the duration of the policy throughout the year

Parameter.Name: Share
Parameter.Comment: Dividing benefit equally between all household members.
